DOC.brief_summary: This study determine effectiveness intervention prevent at-risk kindergarten pre-kindergarten child develop attention deficit hyperactivity disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Reducing Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder Kindergarten Pre-Kindergarten Children
DOC.detailed_description: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) characterize inattention , impulsiveness , hyperactivity . ADHD commonly diagnose child enter formal school show academic behavioral adjustment difficulty , developmental research suggest risk factor develop ADHD evident earlier . A significant number child start school high level disorganize inattentive behavior , symptom emerge ADHD . This study test intervention aim prevent development ADHD identifying risk develop ADHD kindergarten pre-kindergarten teach self-regulation skill socialization . These skill associate school success , may reduce likelihood child develop ADHD . Participation study last 4 month , follow-up assessment 1 year . To enroll , child participant undergo screen process include assessment teacher parent . Eligible child participant also assess researcher classroom set . They randomly assign receive either play-based intervention , call Friendship Group , individual pre-academic tutoring intervention . Both group meet school . The Friendship Group , focus strengthen attention self-regulation social skill , involve 30 session twice week 15 week . The tutor intervention , focus strengthen academic skill , involve one two session week 4 month . Participants assess three time point : pre-intervention , post-intervention , 1 year . Assessments include teacher rating direct test child attention , language , pre-academic skill .
DOC.criteria: Clinical subclinical level ADHD symptomatology , base upon teacher parent report Presence sensorimotor disability , frank neurological disorder , psychosis Estimated Full Scale Intelligence Quotient ( FSIQ ) less 70 Very low level English proficiency preclude completion assessment battery In temporary custody situation uncertain outcome
